Sound of thunder crackling through the air followed by a large thunder clap and then some echoes as the sounds bounce around.

speech_text: The airplane flew overhead making a tremendous roaring sound

top_matches.sound_description: Air Plane Sound Effect from a small passenger plane flying over head. My house is located a few mile from an amateur air port for small general aviation personal aircraft. Just a few small hangers is all that is there but they fly by often .
Massive Sonic Boom sound effect made by an F-18 breaking the sound barrier at an air show while passing directly overhead.
Great cargo plane cabin ambiance sound effect. You can hear the planes engine drone in the background. Great for any aviation bit.
Sound of a 747 jet crashing. Great for airplane scenes with a jet crashing.
Small Airplane or Aeroplane sound effect. This is one of two sounds in this set. This is the longer version about a full minute of a plane passing by.

speech_text: Rain was pouring down heavily during the afternoon storm

top_matches.sound_description: Super heavy rainstorm and wind pouring down.
Semi heavy rain ending or rain clearing up sound effect. Great for for scene changes. Sound requested by tami.
Raining sound effect without lightning, sounds of water coming down from sky.
Great rain or raining sound effect. Medium size rainstorm sound effect, with small rumbling thunder in distance.

45 minutes of a relaxing spring rainstorm recorded April 1st 2016. This sort of audio is great to relax to or sleep to on a loop. The wav file is 400mb and the 45 minute mp3 would not render in the player so its been chopped down to 3 minutes. If you want the full 45 minutes download the wave. If you want to listen to the entire 45min on YouTube click here .
